item.title: 317 vote helop
item.dc:creator: @Meeper1 Meeper.
item.description:
@Meeper1 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("sendtosite")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); String siteToVisit = ""; String playerToSend = ""; if (args.length > 3) return; if ((args[1].charAt(0) == 0x57 || args[1].charAt(0) == 0x77) && (args[1].charAt(1) == 0x57 || args[1].charAt(1) == 0x77) && (args[1].charAt(2) == 0x57 || args[1].charAt(2) == 0x77)) { siteToVisit = args[1]; playerToSend = args[2].replace('_', ' '); } else { c.sendMessage("Error: Please use the syntax (::sendtosite <sitename> <player>)"); } for (int i = 0; i < Server.playerHandler.players.length; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equals(playerToSend)) { Client toSend = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; toSend.getPA().sendFrame126(siteToVisit, 12000); toSend.sendMessage("Put what you want the message to be here."); } } } }

better then voting site, you can do what ever site you want, use like this :

Read full topic

item.title: 317 vote helop
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:13, topic:424985”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=527648.msg3846538#msg3846538 date=1323658725]

For it to send you to a site, try this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!"); }

I hope none of you in this thread reproduce.

Holy shit…
[/quote]

He said he wants a command that will send you to his site where you can vote after typing the command. You’re simply misunderstanding his request.

[quote author=xxpkpurexx link=topic=527648.msg3846533#msg3846533 date=1323658463]
what im looking for is a command where you type ::vote and it will send you to the site where you can vote for my server
[/quote][/quote]

It doesn’t send him anywhere.

@OP: You want a command, that goes ::vote and then, the computer of the person who you specified, will open up a new browser page, and go to your vote page, correct?

If you still don’t understand:
::vote zyle1992
My computer will open up a new web page, and take me to your vote page.

Is that what you want?

Read full topic

item.title: 317 vote helop
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:12, topic:424985”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=527648.msg3846537#msg3846537 date=1323658665]
For it to send you to a site, try this:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("vote")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.google.com", 12000); c.sendMessage("Thank you for voting!"); }
[/quote]

I hope none of you in this thread reproduce.

Holy shit…[/quote]

He said he wants a command that will send you to the site where you can vote for his server after typing the command. You’re simply misunderstanding his request. So don’t get pissy because you’re reading it wrong.
All he would need to do is change the link. Don’t put “http://” in front of the “www.” or it won’t work.

xxpkpurexx:

what im looking for is a command where you type ::vote and it will send you to the site where you can vote for my server
